body: Instead of a pool of 24d6, races without Constitution get a pool of 20d6 to assign to the ability scores, except for Constitution. These characters still must assign a minimum of 3d6 in each of the other ability scores. Increase the number for high-powered games.
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Rules/Race Builder/Step 1 Concept/Races without Constitution/Dice Pool
name: Dice Pool
